channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Live: 2025 Stanley Cup Final
channel.desc: For the second straight year, the Oilers and Panthers play Game 7 of a Stanley Cup Final. Florida averted disaster in the 2024 final, defeating Edmonton 2-1 thanks to Sam Reinhart's second-period marker after blowing a 3-0 series lead. (If necessary).
